Uses of Interface
com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocSegment

  • Packages that use IDocSegment 
    Package Description
    com.sap.conn.idoc
    Contains the major part of the interfaces, classes and factories that an IDoc processing application is typically dealing with.

    • Uses of IDocSegment in com.sap.conn.idoc
